items.name: Godlike Gin
items.description: A gin so godlike even God had a hangover the millennium after he drank it.

powers.name: Last Night on Earth
powers.description: Become irresistible to the opposite sex.

powers.name: Walk through walls. Specialization: asbestos
powers.description: You can walk through walls. Asbestos walls only. (Cancer resistance not included.)

items.name: The Holy Grail
items.description: He/She who drinketh from the Holy Grail shall have Eternal Life.

powers.name: Ball of fire
powers.description: It's a ball of fire that constantly orbits you. Sometimes it's awkward, like that one time at your cousin's wedding.

powers.name: Float over concrete
powers.description: You can levitate! But only over concrete. And hopefully there isn't too much grass growing in the cracks or you might fall on your ass.

items.name: Temple garments
items.description: It's all how you wear them

powers.name: Believe Alternative Facts
powers.description: It's a thing.  Wouldn't we all love to believe we're destined to become priests and priestesses to the next world?

powers.name: Spidey sense
powers.description:
You have the awesome power to detect if there is a spider in the room. Super useful.
Squish them yourself or cohabitate in peace.

mainquest.name: Revenge of the nerds
mainquest.description: The fratboys in the house next door have been noogying you for far too long! Time to cut them down to size. Infiltrate their frathouse and play a prank on them! Nothing complicated, just a simple cross-dimensional portal that will suck them all into the fires of hell!

items.name: Dick in a Box
items.description:
Cut a hole in a box; put your junk in that box.
It's in a box!

items.name: Hot Pants
items.description: They're short pants. They're on fire.

powers.name: Giving of fucks: level zero
powers.description: You have the power to reduce the amount of fucks you give to absolute ZERO.

powers.name: Poker Face
powers.description: Your secret is safe with me.
